actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 9 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 19. Record Vote Number: 9.

Amendment SA 9 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S424-425, S427-428; text: CR S424) To prohibit the sale, lease, transfer, retransfer, or delivery of F-16 aircraft, M1 tanks, or certain other defense articles or services to the Government of Egypt.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 9 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 19. Record Vote Number: 9.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 9 proposed by Senator Paul.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 9 proposed by Senator Paul.

purpose: To prohibit the sale, lease, transfer, retransfer, or delivery of F-16 aircraft, M1 tanks, or certain other defense articles or services to the Government of Egypt.
